//: Random time to unlock new power is 2 hours + hours equal to the Difficulty +/- 20% each way
name: contemplation: biokinesis
contemplation: overcome pain
description: Contemplate your powers and improve your ability to resist pain.

effect.u_message: You spend some time meditating and contemplating your powers and emerge with new knowledge.
